title: Halal Food with Me and My Little Brother
description:
[b]English: [/b]
Riku, Irfan, and Mikha were born in different countries, but they are blood-connected half brothers. Irfan has rules when it comes to food. No pork, miso, or shouyu (Japanese soy sauce)!? Then what can he eat!? What is halal food in the first place...?

Japan x Malaysia, a story of two different mindsets and skin colors. Two families with different cultures live together under one roof!

[b]Indonesia:[/b]
[spoiler]Riku, Irfan, dan Mikha dilahirkan di negara yang berbeda, namun mereka saudara se-ayah. Irfan memiliki aturan saat makan. Tidak boleh babi, miso, atau shoyu!? Lalu apa yang bisa dia makan!? Sebenarnya apa itu makanan halal...?

Jepang x Malaysia, sebuah cerita tentang pola pikir dan warna kulit yang sama sekali berbeda. Dua keluarga dengan budaya yang berbeda tinggal di satu atap yang sama![/spoiler]

matches.title: The Skinny Girl and the Chubby Boy
Lunch Break at the Secret Table
Ying You Chang Feng Yi Bi Yuan
